data.title: SILENT STUD AUCTION
data.text:
The Thoroughbred Ladies Club of British Columbia

THE THOROUGHBRED LADIES CLUB OF BRITISH COLUMBIA

Would like to thank the following stallion owners and managers for their generous

Donations of service to their stallions for the 2021 breeding season:

Storm Victory Partnership – Roads End Farm – SR Farms

Canmor Farms - NATHC - Klimes Farm – Emerald Acres

Stride Away Thoroughbreds - CTHS of BC

STORM VICTORY COUNTERFORCE

(2000 Storm Cat – Funistrada) (2013 Smart Strike - Achieving)

Total Progeny Earnings $6,030,915 Total Earnings Racing $323,708

Klimes Farm - $1,500 Initial year at stud 2019

$200 booking fee, balance due live foal Roads End Farm - $2000

$200 booking fee, balance due live foal

LENT TEXAS WILDCATTER

(2010 Pulpit - Arlucea, by Broad Brush) (2005 Monarchos – Mike’s Wildcat)

Total Earnings Racing $343,937 Total Earnings Racing $301,974

Initial year at stud 2015 Total Progeny Earnings $972,243

Emerald Acres - $2500 Canmor Farms - $1500

$250 booking fee, balance due live foal $200 booking fee, balance due live foal

PIONEEROF THE WEST POP ARTIST

(2012 Pioneerof The Nile – I’s Right) (2006 Songandaprayer – Kipper Quila)

Total Earnings Racing $172,805 Total Earnings Racing $179,226

Initial year at stud 2020 Total Progeny Earnings $237,246

SR Farms - $2000 Emerald Acres - $1500

$200 booking fee, balance due live foal $200 booking fee, balance due live foal

RALIS VALUE PLUS

(2013 Square Eddie - Silar Rules) (2001 Unbridled’s Song – Roll Over Baby)

Total Earnings Racing $426,138 Total Earnings Racing $414,595

Initial year at stud 2019 Total Progeny Earnings $13,743,489

Canmor Farms - $2000 1 Grade 1 winner

$200 booking fee, balance due live foal Stride Away Thoroughbreds - $2500

$250 booking fee, balance due live foal

You are invited to send a sealed bid for the 2021 breeding service to any or all

of the eligible stallions. Each service will be awarded to the highest bidder on each stallion.

ALL bids must be received by mail or email no later than JANUARY 15th, 2021

Successful bidders will be notified immediately by telephone.

10% of the successful bid must be paid by FEBRUARY 1st , 2021

BIDS SUBMITTED MUST BE A MINIMUM 50% OF ADVERTISED FEE

NOTE: If you have only one mare to breed, but would like to bid on more than one stallion service, please indicate your 1st, 2nd, etc., choices. Thank you.

Mail bids to:

Silent Stud Auction

c/o Barbara Williams, #204 – 13965 16th Avenue, Surrey, BC V4A 1P8

For inquiries contact:

Barbara Williams – 604-542-8951 or [email protected]
